scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/build/frontend && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/build/frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/build && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/dist && rm -rf frontend/node_modules
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
